main event: Ret Sgt L. Hanford observed a bright oval-shaped object heading in a straight line for approximately 1 minute on January 6, 1962.
interesting points: The object increased in speed before disappearing from view., The sighting was classified as ground-viewed., Only one object was reported by Hanford., The object was observed in Adak, Alaska., No photograph is included in the report.
witness description: Ret Sgt L. Hanford, an observer
